author: Yong Pung How CJ:
casename: Robin Anak Mawang v Public Prosecutor
counsel: Siaw Kheng Boon (Siaw Kheng Boon and Co) for the appellant; April Phang (Deputy Public Prosecutor) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Criminal Law/Offences/Public tranquillity/Rioting/Appellant member of unlawful assembly with common object of causing hurt/Appellant admitting to punching and kicking victim/Whether necessary to prove appellant punched victim to establish charge of rioting/Sections 141, 146, 147 Penal Code (Cap 224, 1985 Rev Ed)

Evidence/Witnesses/Corroboration/Whether trial judge relying solely on eyewitness's uncorroborated testimony in convicting appellant/Whether absence of express finding of sufficiently compelling testimony warranting acquittal
Evidence/Witnesses/Quality of identification evidence/Whether factors existing supporting identification evidence of good quality
